QuestData.Title: Going Undercover
QuestData.Description: Yrel leads my rangers on a search for the prisoners at the Shadowmoon village.$B$BTheir work is extremely dangerous, so I need you to carry out a contingency mission.$B$BSylene has mastered an illusion spell which will allow you to infiltrate Shaz'gul safely. Speak to her to disguise yourself.$B$BThen, plant explosives at the quartermaster's depot, the main lodge, and the ritual altar.$B$BIn case anything goes wrong, set them off to create a distraction.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Sylene at Twilight Glade to gain an orc illusion, then plant explosives at key locations in Shaz'gul.$B$BIf you lose your disguise, use Sylene's Amulet of Illusion to regain an orc appearance.
QuestData.RewardText: You made it, $n! Boy, am I glad to see you.

Objectives.Objective: Explosives planted at the chieftain's seat
Explosives planted at the training pit
